import json

source.fddd1c22:
def clean_text(text: str) -> str:
    return re.sub('[^A-Za-z0-9]+', ' ', str(text).lower())
source.55ab0a13:
sections = []
with open(f'../input/coleridgeinitiative-show-us-the-data/train/{document_id}.json') as f:
    json_decode = json.load(f)
    for data in json_decode:
        sections.append(data['text'])
